commit.message:
Mark stabilized intrinsics with `rustc_allowed_through_unstable_modules`

Fixes #99286

PR #95956 accidentally made these intrinsics unstable when
accessed through the unstable path segment 'std::intrinsics'

Mark stabilized intrinsics with `rustc_allowed_through_unstable_modules`

Fixes #99286

PR #95956 accidentally made these intrinsics unstable when
accessed through the unstable path segment 'std::intrinsics'
